## SubdivisionScheme.getLevelDimensionX() method

Returns the width of the partitions at the given level.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLevelDimensionX(level: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  level | number | The level. |

<b>Returns:</b>
